directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, add pasta and cook until al dente. Rinse under cold water and drain.
In a large bowl combine shrimp, tomato, green pepper, mayonnaise and salt and pepper to taste. Mix well. Add pasta and toss to coat. Chill for approximately one hour and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Simple Shrimp Pasta Salad
